name: A Leap Of Faith (Mer Grazzini)
description:
Go down the cave to find a treasure(s). It's not like you've got a lot more to do anyway.
Featuring 3 different endings! Easter eggs! A cute and greedy koala! Guitar music! 

Directions with A-D or arrow keys. Jump with W, up arrow, or spacebar.

Made in 4 days for Game A Week 2022: Third week! The theme was: "Falling"
My games keep on getting bigger and bigger. This was not the idea!
